allow: Bash(osascript -e 'tell application ""Finder"" to get items of trash')

Bash(osascript -e 'tell application ""Finder""
    set trashItems to items of trash
    repeat with anItem in trashItems
        get name of anItem & "" - "" & (creation date of anItem as string)
    end repeat
end tell')
Bash(osascript -e 'tell application ""Finder"" to get POSIX path of ((items of trash whose name is ""highlight-wrapper"") as alias)')
Bash(osascript -e 'tell application ""Finder"" to get POSIX path of ((items of trash whose name contains ""highlight"") as alias)')

Bash(osascript -e 'tell application ""Finder""
    set trashItems to (every item of trash whose name is ""highlight-wrapper"")
    repeat with anItem in trashItems
        delete anItem
    end repeat
end tell')
